**Prior Degrees:** BSc, My Degree, Year (or delete this line if you are a BSc Student)

Provide a biography by updating this template. Name this file using the file naming convention of `people/mscs/CCWID - My Name.qmd` (changing the path for bscs, mscs, phds). Also upload an image (portrait, ideally head/shoulders otherwise you might be cut-off on some pages) to the same directory in GitHub and use the same naming convention, e.g.,  `people/mscs/CCWID - My Name.png`

Example bio:

I am a passionate and dedicated individual with a strong background in engineering physics. I have a keen interest in research and development, particularly in the field of materials science. Throughout my academic journey, I have gained valuable experience in conducting experiments, analyzing data, and solving complex problems. I am excited to apply my skills and knowledge to contribute to innovative projects and make a positive impact in the industry.

#### Project

Provide some description about what you are working on, i.e., a formal research project, or just something that you are supporting or learning about at the CCWJ:

This research project aims to investigate the impact of X on Y in the field of Z. We will conduct experiments, collect data, and analyze the results to gain insights into the relationship between X and Y. The findings from this project will contribute to the existing knowledge in Z and have potential applications in various industries.
